sentences.english: Bite valve cover protects from dirt and debris, includes a bite valve inside.
sentences.chinese: 咬合閥蓋保護閥遠離灰塵和碎片，包括內置咬氣門芯。

sentences.english: “Where the broom does not reach”, he said, “the dust will not vanish of itself.”
sentences.chinese: “笤帚不到”，他說，“灰塵不會自己跑掉。”

sentences.english: Dirt, bacteria, and makeup left on overnight can irritate skin, clog pores, and trigger breakouts.
sentences.chinese: 超過一夜的灰塵，細菌和化妝刺激皮膚，堵塞毛孔。

sentences.english: He has also crushed my teeth with gravel; He has covered me with ashes.
sentences.chinese: 又用沙石磣斷我的牙，用灰塵將我蒙蓋。

sentences.english: Can use the brush and vacuum cleaners, washing the dust on the coil.
sentences.chinese: 可使用毛刷和吸塵器清洗盤管上的灰塵。

sentences.english: The leaves are powdered with dust.
The car caused a cloud of dust as it went down the dirt road.
sentences.chinese: 小車沿着佈滿灰土公路飛馳，揚起了漫天灰塵。

sentences.english: Dust coated the furniture in my basement.
sentences.chinese: 我家地下室的傢俱蓋滿了灰塵。

sentences.english: Every time you touch your face, you're oepositing dirt and oil, which can clog pores.
sentences.chinese: 每次摸臉，你都會把阻塞毛孔的灰塵和油脂弄到臉上。

sentences.english: There among that dusty disorder, would you care to play hide - and - seek ?
sentences.chinese: 灰塵鋪滿零亂的書齋，歌兒呵，你可願在那裏捉迷藏？

sentences.english: That smoothness is due to a thick layer of dust blanketing the landscape.
sentences.chinese: 這平滑是由於一層厚厚的灰塵籠罩的景觀。

sentences.english: You can hear dust scooting across the floor?
sentences.chinese: 你能聽見灰塵跑過地板？

sentences.english: The underside of the lower roller is provided with a dust box capable of being twisted open.
sentences.chinese: 在下滾筒的下面安有可旋開的灰塵盒。

sentences.english: The house was just as I left it except that everything was covered with dust.
sentences.chinese: 除了積滿灰塵之外，這房子與我離開時沒什麼兩樣。

sentences.english: The shelves are half empty, and the bottles of cleaning fluidare covered with dust.
sentences.chinese: 店裏的架子一半都空了，裝清洗液的瓶子落滿了灰塵。

sentences.english: Therefore I reprehend myself, and do penance in dust and ashes.
sentences.chinese: 爲此，我收回我所說過的話，坐在灰塵中懺悔。

definition: junk/items of no value/various bits and bobs
deformation/to become deformed/to change shape/to morph
car window/window of vehicle (bus, train etc)
